attributes.action: Negotiate a European passport option for British citizens event of Brexit.
attributes.background: Negotiate with the European Union a passport or type of citizenship which allows British citizens to keep their rights as Europeans in the event of Brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure which rights you want to protect.

You can find out more about how UK citizens' rights to travel in the EU will be affected by Brexit here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/passport-rules-for-travel-to-europe-after-brexit

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
